name: linkding
description: linkding is a bookmark manager that you can host yourself. It's designed be to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker.
short_desc: linkding is a bookmark manager that you can host yourself. It's designed be to be minimal, fast, and easy to set up using Docker.
author: sissbruecker

form_fields.label: Admin Username
form_fields.hint: The username for the Linkding admin account

form_fields.label: Admin Email
form_fields.hint: Email address for the Linkding admin (used for password recovery)

form_fields.label: Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the admin account (make it strong)
